'''15w35d''' is the seventeenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on August 28, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2015/08/minecraft-snapshot-15w35a/</ref> to fix some crashes that occurred in [[15w35c]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w35d|prefix=Minecraft
|;previous
|87563|Punching a wolf crashes game.
|87567|Riding a pig with a carrot on a stick and clicking the right side of the mouse crashes the game.
|87569|Killing a named silverfish crashes game.
}}</onlyinclude>
